sentences.sContent: Why doesn’t she get a divorce ?
One in three marriages ends in divorce .
sentences.sCn: 有三分之一的婚姻以离婚告终。

sentences.sContent: His wife has started divorce proceedings .
sentences.sCn: 他妻子开始了离婚诉讼。

sentences.sContent: the rise in the divorce rate
She received the house as part of the divorce settlement (= the amount of money, property etc each person receives in a divorce case ) .
sentences.sCn: 根据离婚协议她获得了这幢房子。

sentences.sContent: The Act extended the grounds for divorce .
...Then there is the finding we cited in our Science paper of higher divorce and depression rates among a large group of British men who attended single-sex schools as teenagers...

trans.tranOther: the legal ending of a marriage

trans.tranCn: 离婚； 分离， 脱离
trans.tranOther: if someone divorces their husband or wife, or if two people divorce, they legally end their marriage
